name: PRAGATISHEEL MAHILA SAMITI
briefDescription: Pragatisheel  Mahila Samiti(PMS) is a non-profit organization working for weaker section of women for since 1988 in Alwar district of Rajasthan. It deals in the areas of women education, health awareness, family planning and counselling.  Organisation has been organising workshops seminars, awareness camps, Medical camps, DIC-sponsored vocational training Such as sewing, embroidery, beautician course and residential training.  PMS has also organised workshops on Gender sensitivity for police, media, medical and paramedical staff with the help of elected representatives. So far more than 300 women have been benefitted from the services given by PMS.
